mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENTS (ID, ORDERS_ID, PAYMENT_METHOD, STATUS ) VALUES (UUID(), #{ordersId}, #{paymentMethod}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PAYMENTS SET ORDERS_ID = #{ordersId}, PAYMENT_METHOD = #{paymentMethod}, STATUS = #{status}, PAID_AT = #{paidAt}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PAYMENTS WHERE orders_id = #{ordersId} LIMIT 0, 1
